text: RT @TheAtlanticFest: Guests of #TheAtlanticFest 2020 include @Delta CEO Ed Bastian, @eatlearnplay founder @ayeshacurry, the San Francisco district attorney @chesaboudin, and more. text: Publishing student writing shifts students from consumers to creators of stories. LaQuisha Hall, a Baltimore educator, has guided more than 100 students to becoming published authors, @mdawriter reports: https://t.co/mdNdoVmMqW

text: In defeating Joe Kennedy, long-serving Massachusetts senator Ed Markey turned his biggest vulnerability into an opportunity, @russellberman writes: https://t.co/qKVSvchBjk
